summary: SummaryETUDE Soonjung Foam Cleanser is a mildly acidic, non-irritating cleanser that gently removes impurities with rich, abundant bubbles, leaving the skin moisturized and refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsPANTHENSOSIDE CONTAINED TO CALM SKIN: Panthenol (Strengthens skin barrier and soothes dry skin) & Madecassoside (Soothes irritated skin and protects skin from external stimuli)PH BALANCED FORMULA: PH Balanced formula for healthier and more hydrated skinMILD DEEP CLEANSING & SOOTHING FOAM: Moist and rich lather that gently cleanses while leaving a relaxing, moisturizing finishFRAGRANCE-FREE: Unscented, ideal for sensitive skinKey IngredientsPanthenol: Strengthens the skin barrier, retains moisture, and soothes dry skinMadecassoside: Soothes irritated skin, and helps protect skinFormulated WithoutFree from 8 additives (Free of PEG surfactant, sulfate, mineral oil, tar coloring, polyacrylamide, imidazolidinyl urea, triethanolmine, syntheticperfume)Item 2636340How To UsePut a adequate amount of the foam cleanser on damp hands and create enough foam. Then, Gently massage the face and rinse with lukewarm water.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Decyl Glucoside, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Glycol Distearate, Potassium Cocoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-67, Glyceryl Caprylate, Disodium Edta, Sodium Acetate, Sodium Chloride, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Madecassoside.
how_to_use: Put a adequate amount of the foam cleanser on damp hands and create enough foam. Then, Gently massage the face and rinse with lukewarm water.

reviews.headline: Fav facial cleanser
reviews.comments: I've used this cleanser for three years now, and I still love it. I have dry skin and my husband has oily skin and it works well for both of us.

reviews.headline: Not for oily skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin that is very oily in the t-zone. I used this face wash yesterday with my typical tinted spf and powder combo and was an oil slick 3 hours after, when usually I don't have breakthrough oil for at last 5-6 hours. I tried this face wash last night with my usual nightitme moisturizer, and woke up and oil slick again, which is not normal for me. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: The best cleanser I've ever used. It's gentle, acne friendly and does not dry out your skin. Purchased here because it was sold out at Senti Senti (Korean skin care store based in NY) and I'm confused why it costs more on Ulta LOL you should match your prices to the cost it is everywhere, or everyone should support small owned businesses. They ship quick too!

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: Its doesnt have a heavy scent, leaves the skin feeling clean and fresh.

reviews.headline: Fav cleanser
reviews.comments: This has to be my fav cleanser. It leaves your skin clean and doesnt break you out.
